#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,ht[200005],i,j,dp[200005],min_;
    cin>>n;
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i)           cin>>ht[i];
    dp[1]=0;
    for(i=2;i<=n;++i)
    {
        dp[i]=INT_MAX;
        for(j=1;j<=i;j<<=1)     dp[i]=min(dp[i],abs(ht[i]-ht[i-j])+dp[i-j]);
    }
    cout<<dp[n];
    return 0;
}
